content: who doesn t love an easy stylish modern crochet storage basket to fancy up their home this free crochet pattern uses only single_crochet stitches but with a modern twist in this pattern you will also learn how to make the single_crochet spike stitch it s worked the same way as a regular single_crochet stitch only placed in a unique spot this creates the extra fancy textured rim of the basket you will need 3 skeins of paintbox cotton dk 2 skeins of your main color and 1 skein of your accent color this pattern is also worked entirely using double strands you can find several helpful tutorials within the pattern that will help you complete this project enjoy please note that this is an ad-free beautifully formatted and concise pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free with ads on my blog to view the free version go to https //www sigonimacaroni com/easy-modern-crochet-storage-basket-free-crochet-pattern/
